conclusion: Solve step by step to find the power of the electromagnetic railgun when the projectile is launched.
Given information: Rail length, parallel rail spacing, projectile mass, rail current, magnetic field strength, resistances neglected.
Understand the working principle: projectile between two parallel rails with current flowing, creating a magnetic field and Lorentz force.
Calculate the Lorentz force on the projectile: F = I × L' × B = 0.2 N.
Calculate the acceleration of the projectile: a = F/m = 10 m/s².
Calculate the final velocity of the projectile: v = √10 m/s ≈ 3.16 m/s.
Calculate the kinetic energy of the projectile: E_k = 0.1 J.
Calculate the time taken for the launch: t = √0.1 s ≈ 0.316 s.
Calculate the power: P = E_k/t ≈ 0.316 W.
Final answer: The power of the electromagnetic railgun when the projectile is launched is approximately 0.316 W.
